tooltip.flashnpcs.behavior_editor_shift:
§eRight-Click§r on an NPC to modify its behavior.
§eRight-click§r a block to create/add to a path.
§eRight-Click§r Air to remove the last path block.
§eShift+Right-Click§r Air to remove Path.
tooltip.flashnpcs.npc_editor_shift:
§eRight-Click§r on an NPC to modify its general settings.
§eShift+Right-Click§r on an NPC to open its dialogue editor.
§eRight-Click§r Air to open a new dialogue editor.
§eShift+Right-Click§r Air to modify a function.
§eRight-Click§r a block to spawn a new NPC.
tooltip.flashnpcs.save_tool_shift:
§eShift+Right-Click§r on an NPC to save the NPC.
§eShift+Right-Click§r on a block to select a saved NPC to spawn.
